    • posix

      public Boolean posix(Vector<Tiles> t, int column, Playground p)
      Method to place picked tiles on the player's shelf, given a column to place them in and their coordinates on the playground.
      Parameters:
      t - The coordinates of the picked tiles
      column - The column on the player's shelf to place the tiles in
      p - The playground object where the tiles were originally placed
      Returns:
      true if the tiles were successfully placed on the shelf, false otherwise

    • available

      public int available(int column) throws LibraryException
      This method calculates the number of free spots available in each column of the player's shelf.
      Returns:
      An array of integers representing the number of free spots in each column of the shelf.
      Throws:
      LibraryException
